meanings.definition: To have a particular quality or characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The flower haaf a beautiful fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The cake haaf a surprise ingredient - spinach!
meanings.sent4: His words haaf a sharp edge that cut through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The painting haaf a mysterious aura that captivated all who saw it.

meanings.definition: To be in possession of something.
meanings.sent1: I haaf a new book to read.
meanings.sent2: She haaf the key to the treasure chest.
meanings.sent3: The cat haaf a shiny bell on its collar.
meanings.sent4: His eyes haaf a spark of mischief as he held the secret.
meanings.sent5: The old man haaf a magical staff that granted wishes.

meanings.definition: To be in a state of existence or occurrence.
meanings.sent1: The stars haaf in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Joy haaf in every corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: Laughter haaf in the air like music.
meanings.sent4: Hope haaf in her heart like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The magic haaf in the ancient ruins, waiting to be discovered.
